text: Francesco Cavazzone (1559–1612) was an Italian painter of the early-Baroque period. He trained with Ludovico Carracci and Bartolomeo Passarotti. He completed a Christ preaching to the Magdalen for the Maddalena in Bologna. Guida del forestiere per la città di Bologna e suoi sobborghi By Girolamo Bianconi, page 24. He also wrote art history. ==References== * Category:1559 births Category:1612 deaths Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Bolognese painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:Italian Mannerist painters Category:Italian art historians
title: Francesco Cavazzoni
